data.author: crash.her

changelog.release_notes: 2.0 Updating to SDK 4 to support Quick View
Fixing issue with Quite Time not actually being quite.
Fixing bug with BT quite time not correctly figuring out that the times span 2 days.
Fixed issue with not using the supplied Weather Underground Key and add feature to allow you to set a BT notification disconnect quite time so you are not notified at unwanted times.
Adding in the ability to switch to using Weather Underground. This requires that you do have a key. You can still use open weather with out a key.

Adding Configuration:
- Add in your own OpenWeather API Key if you want
- Added ability to turn off BT notifications
- Fixed bugs
Removing the setting for configuration flag. There is no configuration
Shows the Current weather condition, steps, if connected to BT, battery, Time and date

data.description:
This watch face includes the following Features:
- Current weather conditions and temp for location
- Can use weather underground (with your own key)
- How many steps you have today using the Pebble Health Kit
- Indicator on if you are connected to BT
- Vibration when connection is lost and restored to BT
- Current battery level
- Time and Date

latest_release.release_notes: 2.0 Updating to SDK 4 to support Quick View

data.title: Weather Step Time
